derivation: from G3844 (παραῤῥυέω) and the alternate of G4482 (παραῤῥυέω);
strongs_def: to flow by, i.e. (figuratively) carelessly pass (miss)
outline:
1. to glide by: lest we be carried by, pass by
    1. lest the salvation which these things heard show us how to obtain, slip away from us
    2. a thing escapes me
    3. slips my mind
